pages.text: This is a mouse. They are known for being small and fast, they love nibbling seeds and herbs!

pages.title: About the Mouse
pages.text: Mice can be found in biomes such as forests and plains. $(br2)Mice tend to stay near grass and herbs where they can hide, and they will run away if you scare them. They are not as fast as squirrels and pigeons, so this is the easiest prey to catch. $(br2)Mice are decent prey to eat, and they are very yummy!$(br)
